name: SudoCube - Block brain Games
description:
No longer a thick, heavy brick, but a fresh and simple jigsaw puzzle!

SudoCube uses a fresh and simple blue-green color scheme to protect your eyes and relieve stress at the same time. It is very suitable for you who like puzzle casual block games!

How to play: Drag the blocks into the board so that each block of different shapes can fill any of the nine grids or ranks in the board to eliminate the score.

How to properly place the cubes to get more elimination scores needs to keep smart minds and clear thinking. Come and try it out!

In this update we fixed several minor bugs and made some improvements.We hope you enjoy it! Contact us in case you have feedback or any questions!
